description: This coverage is a vector polygon/layer illustrating a coastal buffer that extends a 100 km on land. The layer was produced by CORDIO based on a high resolution coastal line derived from the GSHHS_shp: Shape-files (polygons) shorelines.
keywords: coastal, buffer, Africa, Western Indian Ocean, Comoros, Kenya, Madagascar, Mauritius, Mayotte, Mozambique, Reunion, Seychelles, Somalia, South Africa, Tanzania
name: WIO 100 km coastal buffer
